name: The Fairy Feast
description:
This was s a month long remote game jam for the Cleveland Game Developers. The jam ran from May 9th, to June 6th

The theme was Consume

----------------------------------------------------

You awaken lost in the underground., the night before the Fairy Feast. The Cave is filled with dirt, and you will need to eat your way out to escape

Move With WASD

Spit with Space.
